title: Does access to Lugo Wato guarantee free meals there for life?
subtitle: It's not a wise call to say that a lifetime supply of free food is not a good reason to get tattooed for a restaurant logo -- it just won't work.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: People who get tattoos of slogans from one of a variety of restaurants - such as McDonalds, Taco Bell, Chipotle - are guaranteed free food there for life.
